text: Alceu de Deus Collares (12 September 1927 – 24 December 2024) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was the Governor of Rio Grande do Sul from 1991 to 1995. He was also a member of the Chamber of Deputies and Mayor of Porto Alegre from 1986 to 1989. He was a member of the Democratic Labor Party of Brazil. Collares was born in Bagé, Brazil. Collares died on 24 December 2024 at a hospital in Porto Alegre from multiple organ failure caused by pneumonia at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Politicians from Rio Grande do Sul Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure
title: Alceu Collares
